---
name: Add Event Management Features
about: Implement comprehensive event management capabilities for admins
title: "Feature: Advanced Event Management"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Expand event management capabilities with event creation, editing, deletion, and detailed event information management.

## New Features
- Event creation by club admins
- Event editing and updates
- Event deletion functionality
- Detailed event information (location, capacity, requirements)
- Event cancellation and rescheduling
- Event status tracking (upcoming, ongoing, completed)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Admins can create new events
- [ ] Event details can be edited
- [ ] Events can be deleted by admins
- [ ] Event status updates work correctly
- [ ] Changes are reflected immediately in calendar/listing
